channel.title: CVE Feed for ExS -- ExS Widgets
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ExS -- ExS Widgets

item.title: CVE-2024-38715|2024-08-02T04:19:19.438Z -- exs -- exs%20widgets
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in ExS ExS Widgets allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects ExS Widgets: from n/a through 0.3.1.
